page.title: 03Statistics/Pupils/Handsacre.
page.content: At Hayes Meadow C.P. School a survey was carried out about Personal statistics. These measurments are,skull size, weight, height, foot size. There is a different section for boys and girls. WEIGHT AGE. SEX. LARGEST.SMALLEST. AV. 4-5 M 24 kg 14 kg 20 kg 4-5 F 21 kg 15 kg 18 kg 5-6 M 28 kg 16 kg 22 kg 5-6 F 27 kg 18 kg 23 kg 6-7 M 45 kg 19 kg 32 kg 6-7 F 32 kg 24 kg 29 kg 7-8 M 30 kg 23 kg 30 kg 7-8 F 54 kg 24 kg 26 kg 8-9 M 43 kg 25 kg 32 kg 8-9 F 35 kg 23 kg 28 kg 9-10 M 46 kg 23 kg 32 kg 9-10 F 45 kg 22 kg 34 kg
